title: React Conference 2025
description: A conference about all things React and frontend development.
long_description: Join over 1000 developers at the largest React event in Eastern Europe. This full-day experience includes hands-on workshops, expert panels, and networking opportunities with top companies in the industry.

title: Jazz Night
description: Live jazz performances from local artists.
long_description: Enjoy an intimate evening of jazz at one of Bucharest’s coziest underground clubs. Featuring saxophone solos, smooth piano, and a curated wine list.

title: Gourmet Food Festival
description: Taste dishes from top local chefs and street food vendors.
long_description: Experience a celebration of Romanian and international cuisine with food trucks, live cooking shows, and artisanal product tastings.

title: Modern Art Expo
description: An exhibition featuring contemporary artworks and installations.
long_description: Explore interactive installations, digital projections, and modern sculptures from over 30 emerging Romanian artists.

title: City Marathon
description: Join the annual marathon and support a charitable cause.
long_description: Run through the city center and support youth sports programs. Choose from 5K, 10K, half-marathon, and full-marathon options.

title: Startup Pitch Night
description: Pitch your startup to investors and network with entrepreneurs.
long_description: Ten early-stage startups will pitch in front of a panel of angel investors and venture capitalists. Drinks and open networking after the pitches.

title: AI Innovation Summit
description: Explore the future of AI and machine learning applications.
long_description: Industry leaders and academic researchers gather to present breakthroughs in artificial intelligence, robotics, and automation. Includes panel talks and demos.

title: Acoustic Sundays
description: An open-air acoustic music experience.
long_description: Relax in the park with live acoustic performances from Romanian indie artists. Bring a blanket and enjoy local food vendors.

title: Vegan Street Fair
description: Try out healthy vegan street food from dozens of vendors.
long_description: From vegan burgers to plant-based desserts, enjoy creative dishes from Romania's best vegan chefs in a vibrant open-air setup.

title: Digital Art Market
description: Buy and sell NFT art and meet digital artists.
long_description: Explore a curated gallery of digital art, attend workshops on minting and selling NFTs, and connect with other creatives.

title: Yoga in the Park
description: Morning yoga and meditation in the city park.
long_description: Start your Sunday with a relaxing yoga session led by certified instructors. All levels welcome. Bring your mat!

title: Freelancer Meet & Pitch
description: Pitch your freelance services and find clients.
long_description: An informal networking event where freelancers and remote workers present what they do in short 5-min lightning talks.

title: Hackathon for Humanity
description: Develop apps to solve real-world problems.
long_description: 48 hours. 10 social challenges. Code, design, and collaborate for a better future. Food and mentorship provided.

title: Summer Beats Festival
description: A three-day music festival featuring DJs from around the world.
long_description: Join thousands of fans on the beach for three nights of electronic, house, and techno music with epic stage setups.

title: Gastronomy Gala
description: Michelin-star chefs cook live in a one-night-only event.
long_description: Enjoy a five-course tasting menu prepared by top chefs from across Europe in an elegant gala setting with live music.

title: Sculpture Garden Tour
description: A walking tour of modern sculptures and installations.
long_description: Join a guided tour of the newest public sculptures in Romania’s artistic garden route with commentary from art historians.

title: Urban Hike Challenge
description: An adventurous hike through the heart of the city.
long_description: Complete challenges at historic checkpoints in this 10km hike around the urban core. Fun for friends and teams.

title: Startup Showcase Expo
description: Discover promising startups and network with founders.
long_description: Walk through demo booths of innovative startups, meet founders, and hear pitches. Investors and accelerators in attendance.

title: Cloud DevCon
description: Learn the latest in cloud infrastructure and DevOps.
long_description: Join cloud architects and DevOps experts for talks and workshops on AWS, Azure, CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and scaling distributed systems.

title: Indie Music Parade
description: A celebration of independent musicians and bands.
long_description: Experience the sounds of Romania's indie scene with 20+ bands, open-air stages, and local merch stalls. Great vibes guaranteed.

title: Craft Beer & Bites
description: Sample craft beers and artisan food pairings.
long_description: Taste the best Romanian microbrews alongside perfectly paired bites. Brewery tours, food trucks, and live DJ all day.

title: Street Art Jam
description: Watch live mural painting and graffiti competitions.
long_description: Graffiti crews from across Romania compete in live painting jams while DJs spin and workshops run for all ages.

title: Fit & Fun Family Day
description: Fun obstacle courses and group workouts for all ages.
long_description: Join fitness instructors and trainers for family-friendly games, obstacle races, dance workouts, and wellness talks.

title: Angel Investor Connect
description: Speed networking with potential angel investors.
long_description: Early-stage founders meet investors in a rapid-fire format. Pitch, connect, and get feedback. Invite-only afterparty for top 10 startups.
